SELECT t.CHECKINGSTATUS checkingstatus, t.TICKETNUMBER ticketnumber, c.USERNAME username, t.ID id, t.CHECKINGSITE checkingsite, t.ORDERID orderid FROM WT_TICKETS t left JOIN WT_ORDERFORM o on o.ID=t.ORDERID left join CUSTOMERS c on c.ID = o.CUSTOMERSID WHERE o.FREQUENCY_ID = #{frequencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select c.COMPANY_NAME as companyName, line.DEPARTURE as departure, line.DESTINATION as destination, re.Region_RegionName as departureName, re2.Region_RegionName as destinationName, cus.USERNAME as phoneNum, f.DEPARTUREDATE as departuredate, f.DEPARTURETIME as departuretime from wt_tickets t LEFT JOIN wt_orderform o on t.ORDERID = o.ID LEFT JOIN customers cus on o.CUSTOMERSID = cus.ID LEFT JOIN wt_frequency f on o.FREQUENCY_ID = f.FREQUENCY_ID LEFT JOIN wt_classline cl on f.CLASSLINE_ID = cl.CLASSLINE_ID LEFT JOIN wt_lines line on cl.LINE_ID = line.LINE_ID LEFT JOIN wt_company c on line.COMPANY = c.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN gt_region re on line.DEPARTURE = re.Region_Code LEFT JOIN gt_region re2 on line.DESTINATION = re2.Region_Code where o.PAYSTATUS = 1 and t.TICKETNUMBER = #{ticketnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and f.DEPARTUREDATE = curdate() and INSTR( f.CARS_DRIVERS, #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) > 0

SELECT t.id AS ticketID, t.TICKETNUMBER AS ticketnumber, t.TICKETSITE AS ticketsite, IFNULL(site.SITENAME,re.Region_RegionName) AS ticketsiteName, t.CHECKINGSTATUS AS checkingstatus, CASE t.CHECKINGSTATUS WHEN 0 THEN '未检票' WHEN 1 THEN '已检票' END AS checkingStatusName FROM wt_tickets t LEFT JOIN wt_site site ON t.TICKETSITE = site.SITENUMBER LEFT JOIN gt_region re on t.TICKETSITE = re.Region_Code WHERE t.ORDERID = #{orderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT c.USERNAME as mobile, f.DEPARTUREDATE as departureDate, f.DEPARTURETIME as departureTime, re2.Region_RegionName as destination, group_concat(t.TICKETNUMBER) as ticketNums, IFNULL(site.SITENAME,re.Region_RegionName) AS ticketsiteName FROM wt_orderform o LEFT JOIN wt_frequency f ON o.FREQUENCY_ID = f.FREQUENCY_ID LEFT JOIN wt_classline cl ON f.CLASSLINE_ID = cl.CLASSLINE_ID LEFT JOIN wt_lines line ON cl.LINE_ID = line.LINE_ID LEFT JOIN gt_region re2 ON line.DESTINATION = re2.Region_Code LEFT JOIN wt_tickets t ON o.ID = t.ORDERID LEFT JOIN wt_site site ON t.TICKETSITE = site.SITENUMBER LEFT JOIN gt_region re on t.TICKETSITE = re.Region_Code LEFT JOIN customers c ON o.CUSTOMERSID = c.ID WHERE o.ID = #{orderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
